thread.title: Broncos' Miller pays price for dirty dancing, fined $11,567
thread.title_full: Broncos' Miller pays price for dirty dancing, fined $11,567

author: Slain victims of mass shooting at Oregon college identified
title: Broncos' Miller pays price for dirty dancing, fined $11,567
text:
Broncos' Miller pays price for dirty dancing, fined $11,567 theScore 19 hrs ago © Joe Amon / Denver Post / Getty Denver Broncos linebacker Von Miller celebrated a sack on quarterback Alex Smith by performing two hip thrusts in the team's 31-24 win over the Kansas City Chiefs in Week 2.
AdChoices They are now probably the two most expensive thrusts of Miller's life.
The linebacker was officially fined $11,567 by the league for unsportsmanlike conduct for the sack dance.
Little extra from Von Miller pic.twitter.com/rdouSXpCMy
— Mez (@Mighty1ne) September 18, 2015
The dance was a clear nod to the Key & Peele skit about excessive celebrations.
The league continues to crack down on the serious issues, with Miller's thrusts probably deemed too mesmerizing.
We all know what the NFL really stands for.
